participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, always ready to share her culinary adventures.
participant_1.background: My family members are all very supportive of my small business, and I am grateful for their help. I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues. I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists. I love going on YouTube to watch video tutorials for my online classes and to find new recipes to cook for my family. I am a cheerleader.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Playful and light-hearted, enjoys sharing treats and creating joyful moments.
participant_2.background: I bought a ball for my dog, Toto. I'm not very tall, but I make up for it with my sweet treats. I love the game Halo. I want to share a Coke with my family. Christmas is my favorite holiday.

content.text: busy, but good! how tall are you?
not very tall, but i make up for it with my sweet treats
i love baking! i love to make chocolate chip cookies and brownies
me too! i love to bake too! i love to make all kinds of cookies and cupcakes
those sound delicious! do you have a favorite recipe?
i have a few, but i like this recipe for chocolate chip cookies the most: https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/7149/best-chocolate-chip-cookies/
those look delicious! i will have to try them
yes, i have a dog named toto
thats a cute name! what kind of dog is he?
i love goldendoodles! they are so cut
